body.p: To his Excellency T E Bramlett Governor of Ky we the undersigned petitioners would represent unto your honour that at the last term of the Taylor Circuit Court James DeWitt was fined $40 -- for shooting at Jacob Shofreer, we would represent, unto your honour that at the time the shooting took place said Dewitt was drinking, & was so drunk that he Could not walk without staggering falling about. in fact so drunk that we do not think he knew what he was doing, he is a poor Young man with no property, hard working boy is agout 17 years old & is not quarrelsome, never had any other difficulty that we Know of, we would respectfully petition your honour to remit said fine

W Howell
Wm Cloyd
D G. Mitchell
J. B. McWhorter was present
R Davis
A Matthis
J. D. Williams
T. R. Wright
Geo W Redmon
F. I. Hiestan
I join with the above petitioners in recommending the remission of the fine against James DeWitt

Taylor Cir Ct
vs
Jas Dewitt
